TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmiConfigurationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WmiConfigurationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WmiConfigurationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: WmiConfiguration 属性指示程序集包含通过使用 WMI.NET 提供程序扩展模型实现 WMI 提供程序的代码。

span.span: The WmiConfiguration attribute indicates that an assembly contains code that implements a WMI provider by using the WMI.NET Provider Extensions model.

summary.span: 该属性接受建立所实现的 WMI 提供程序的高级配置的参数。

span.span: The attribute accepts parameters that establish the high-level configuration of the implemented WMI provider.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string scope) cil managed

param.name: scope
param.span: 提供程序将用于公开类的 WMI 命名空间。

span.span: The WMI namespace in which the provider will expose classes.
For example, "root\MyProviderNamespace".

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类指定 WMI 提供程序用于公开类的 WMI 命名空间。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that specifies the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider will expose classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 提供程序必须公开在命名空间及其类。A WMI provider must expose its classes in a namespace. 这是原因构造函数需要作为参数的作用域。That is why the constructor requires scope as a parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostingGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 WMI 提供程序的承载组。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosting group for the WMI provider.

value.span: 一个 值，指示 WMI 提供程序的承载组。

span.span: A value that indicates the hosting group for the WMI provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管组仅适用于进程内承载的提供程序。Hosting groups only apply to providers that are hosted in-process. 有关分离式提供程序忽略的值。The value is ignored for decoupled providers. 承载组是一组过程中提供的所有已分配相同的主机组名称。A hosting group is a set of in-process providers that are all assigned the same hosting group name. 托管的组名称是一个字符串，定义要为提供程序进行逻辑分组。The hosting group name is a string that you define to logically group the providers. 中的相同的承载组相同的安全上下文下运行的进程内提供程序的所有托管 Wmiprvse.exe 过程的单个实例中。All of the in-process providers in the same hosting group running under the same security context are hosted within a single instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process. 因此，共享相同的主机组和安全上下文的提供程序共享相同的服务主机进程。So, providers that share the same hosting group and security context share the same service host process. ## Examples 在以下示例中，用于指示程序集包含在还承载任何 Wmiprvse.exe 进程的实例中实现在 NetworkService 安全上下文下运行，承载的进程内提供程序此外在 NetworkService 安全上下文中运行其他的进程内提供相同的主机组中。In the following example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements an in-process provider that runs under the NetworkService security context and is hosted in a instance of the Wmiprvse.exe process that also hosts any other in-process providers in the same hosting group that also run within the NetworkService security context. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService), HostingGroup = "MyProviders"] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel HostingModel { System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel get(); void set(System::Management::Instrumentation::ManagementHostingModel value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 WMI 提供程序的承载模型。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosting model for the WMI provider.

value.span: 一个 值，指示 WMI 提供程序的承载模型。

span.span: A value that indicates the hosting model of the WMI provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序或由 WMI 服务，可以承载 WMI 提供程序。WMI providers can be hosted by an application or by the WMI service. WMI 提供程序的应用程序承载称为分离式提供程序。WMI providers hosted by an application are called decoupled providers. 托管的 WMI 服务则称为进程内提供程序。Those hosted by the WMI service are called in-process providers. 托管的模型值可确定这两个承载模型以及在进程内提供程序，该提供程序运行的帐户 （安全上下文中） 的情况下。The hosting model value determines both the hosting model and, in the case of in-process providers, the account (security context) under which the provider runs. 有关 HostingModel 的可能值的更多详细信息，请参阅。For more detail about the possible values of HostingModel, see . 若要了解有关承载模型的详细信息，请参阅[提供程序承载和安全性](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075)在 MSDN 上的 WMI SDK 中的主题。To learn more about hosting models, see the [Provider Hosting and Security](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100075) topic in the WMI SDK on MSDN. ## Examples 在以下示例中，用于指示该列包含在此程序集实现通过 root\NVPair 命名空间公开的提供程序。In the following example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace. 因为托管模型不是，它是进程内提供程序。Because the hosting model is not , it is an in-process provider. 值指示 NetworkService 安全上下文下运行的进程内提供程序。The value indicates that the in-process provider runs under the NetworkService security context. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.NetworkService)] ``` 在下一步的示例中，用于指示该列包含在此程序集实现通过 root\NVPair 命名空间公开的提供程序。In the next example, the is used to indicate that the assembly it is contained in implements a provider that is exposed through the root\NVPair namespace. 值指示它是分离式提供程序。The value indicates that it is a decoupled provider. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root\\NVPair", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled)] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IdentifyLevel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IdentifyLevel : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指定 WMI 提供程序是否可以模拟其调用方。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the WMI provider can impersonate its callers.

summary.span: 如果该值为 false，则说明提供程序无法模拟；如果该值为 true，则说明提供程序可以模拟。

span.span: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示提供程序是否可以模拟其调用方。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a provider can or cannot impersonate its callers.

value.span: 如果该值为 false，则说明提供程序无法模拟；如果该值为 true，则说明提供程序可以模拟。

span.span: If the value is false, the provider cannot impersonate, and if the value is true, the provider can impersonate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅在线上的 MSDN library 中的"提供程序承载和安全性"主题[ http://www.msdn.com ](https://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the "Provider Hosting and Security" topic in the MSDN library online at [http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 IdentifyLevel 参数以指示提供程序可以模拟其调用方。The following example demonstrates how to use the IdentifyLevel parameter to indicate that the provider can impersonate its callers. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root/MyProv", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled, IdentifyLevel = true] ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NamespaceSecurity { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NamespaceSecurity : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 字符串，它指定提供程序用于公开管理对象的命名空间的安全描述符。

span.span: Gets or sets a Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string that specifies the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.

value.span: 一个 SDDL 字符串，表示提供程序用于公开管理对象的命名空间的安全描述符。

span.span: An SDDL string that represents the security descriptor on the namespace in which the provider exposes management objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何表示安全描述符的 SDDL 格式的详细信息，请参阅[安全描述符字符串格式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763)MSDN library 中的主题。For more information about how to represent security descriptors in SDDL format, see the [Security Descriptor String Format](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100763) topic in the MSDN library online. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 NamespaceSecurity 参数在此程序集中实现的提供程序用于公开 WMI 类的根/SDTest 命名空间上设置的安全描述符。The following example demonstrates how to use the NamespaceSecurity parameter to set the security descriptor on the root/SDTest namespace in which the provider implemented in this assembly exposes WMI classes. ``` [assembly: WmiConfiguration("root/SDTest", HostingModel = ManagementHostingModel.Decoupled, IdentifyLevel = false, NamespaceSecurity = "O:BAG:BAD:(A;CI;0x60003;;;WD)")] ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As String
public: property System::String ^ Scope { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 WMI 提供程序用于公开类的 WMI 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the WMI namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.

value.span: 一个 值，指示 WMI 提供程序用于公开类的命名空间。

span.span: A value that indicates the namespace in which the WMI provider exposes classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WMI 命名空间是 WMI 存储库中的类别。A WMI namespace is a category within the WMI repository. 通常使用 root/cimv2 命名空间包含描述通用信息模型，版本 2 由桌面管理任务组 (DMTF) 联合会定义的类。The commonly-used root/cimv2 namespace houses classes that describe the Common Information Model, Version 2, defined by the Desktop Management Task Force (DMTF) consortium. 您应只公开了该命名空间中的提供程序，如果您基于标准的 CIM 模型扩展。You should only expose your providers in that namespace if you expanding upon the standard CIM model. 否则，应创建相应的命名空间，并使之对用户明确他们可能要查找的命名空间中的 WMI 类的类型。Otherwise, you should create an appropriate namespace that makes clear to users the type of WMI classes they can expect to find in the namespace.

summary.span: 获取或设置 WMI 提供程序的安全描述符。

span.span: Gets or sets a security descriptor for the WMI provider.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/) 上 MSDN 联机库中的“__Win32Provider”主题所介绍的 SecurityDescriptor 属性信息。

span.span: For more information, see the SecurityDescriptor property information in the "__Win32Provider" topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](https://www.msdn.com/).

value.span: 一个 值，其中包含 WMI 提供程序的安全描述符。

span.span: A value that contains the security descriptor for the WMI provider.
